name: product_poster
description: Promo template with blue background, bold headline, cookie image, and CTA button

fieldPrompt.logo_url: Upload a high-resolution logo of your business with transparent background (PNG format). The logo should be clear, crisp, and easily recognizable at different sizes. Ensure it represents your brand identity effectively and builds trust with customers.
fieldPrompt.headline: Create an attention-grabbing headline (max 15 characters) that highlights your product's main benefit or offer. Examples: Premium Quality, 50% Off Today, New Arrival. Keep it short, impactful, and focused on the key value proposition.
fieldPrompt.subtitle: Write a compelling subtitle (max 40 characters) that provides more details about your product or promotion. This should complement the headline and provide additional context. Examples: Experience the difference with our premium materials, Limited time offer - don't miss out.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code (4-7 characters) that represents your brand identity or the mood you want to convey. Examples: #FF9900 for orange, #4A90E2 for blue. Choose colors that align with your brand and create the right emotional response.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear call-to-action (max 20 characters) that tells customers what to do next. Examples: Shop Now, Learn More, Get Started, Order Today. Make it action-oriented and compelling.
fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with transparent background, showing your product from an appealing angle with professional lighting. Include specific details about the subject, lighting setup, composition, and any specific angles that showcase the product's best features.
